name: Frantiking
description:
Frantiking is a 3D, third person, co-op tower defense game in a fantasy world where you need to defend your base from wave based coming enemy units.

Players need to cooperate with environment and the team to defend the castle.

Features:
-Four different hero classes (Tank, Warrior, Mage, Archer)
-1 designed level with 10 waves
-1 basic and 1 ultimate skill for each hero classes
-Barrack area to develop friendly units (minions) 

Future Update Plan:
-More levels
-More strategy elements
-Skill tree system
-Various biomes
-VFX and SFX improvements

It's in pre-alpha stage. There may be major bugs or lack of gameplay features.

Developer: Erim Ergin
3D Design & UI/UX: Buğra Yahya Arasıl
Sound & Level Design: Cihan Karayazı
